body: If you want the the english version, just search the author on DA or pixiv
well I agree, there should be some sex scenes
Alright just so I don't look like an idiot complaining, I know this is an aggregate site that auto-gathers all these works from 'there' and that this piece of shit got uploaded 'there'.
This could be some good art but why is this shit here again by the same guy "meowwithme"? WTF
